cells.data:
Dynamic programming is my kryptonite. It involves a strange sort of "letting go" that I haven't quite qualified. Trusting that the solution to subproblems will lead to an aggregate solution is hard to grok. Only way to really overcome this is to study it a lot, do a lot of problems, e.g. work it!

Longest Common Subsequence is a basic example. The subproblems are: what to do when we match letters, vs what to do when we don't. Solve those and find the longest (e.g. max), and we're good!
